Ogre::PagingLandScapeRenderable

Ogre::PagingLandScapeRenderable Class Reference

#include <OgrePagingLandScapeRenderable.h>

Collaboration diagram for Ogre::PagingLandScapeRenderable:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Represents a LandScape tile in terms of vertexes.

Remarks:
A LandScapeRenderable represents a tile used to render a block of LandScape using the procedural terrain approach for LOD.

Definition at line 33 of file OgrePagingLandScapeRenderable.h.

Member Function Documentation

void Ogre::PagingLandScapeRenderable::_setNeighbor ( Neighbor  n,
PagingLandScapeRenderable *  t 
) [inline]

Sets the appropriate neighbor for this TerrainRenderable.

Neighbors are necessary to know when to bridge between LODs.

Definition at line 1213 of file OgrePagingLandScapeRenderable.cpp.

void Ogre::PagingLandScapeRenderable::getRenderOperation ( RenderOperation &  rend  )  [virtual]

Constructs a RenderOperation to render the TerrainRenderable.

Remarks:
Each TerrainRenderable has a block of vertices that represent the terrain. Index arrays are dynamically created for mipmap level, and then cached.
